verbs.description: [ARG0: The thought police] [V: have] [ARG1: a new rule] . We should n’t teach our children about the 45th president because it is propaganda . According to Think Progress , Teachers and parents are enraged over what they call “ pro - Trump propaganda ” from Scholastic in form of two books .
